Package me.aecsocket.calibre.defaults.gui

Class SlotViewGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.gui.GUI
      • me.aecsocket.calibre.defaults.gui.SlotViewGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.gui.IGUI
    public class SlotViewGUI
extends me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.gui.GUI
    A GUI representing the slots of a CalibreComponent. On every slot update such as taking a component out, the GUI is validated through validate(GUIView), and if it does not pass the GUI closes. This prevents duplication exploits.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SlotViewGUI​(CalibrePlugin plugin, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.gui.GUIManager guiManager, CalibreComponent component, boolean allowModification)
      Creates a slot view of a virtual component (not linked to a real ItemStack).
      SlotViewGUI​(CalibrePlugin plugin, me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.gui.GUIManager guiManager, CalibreComponent component, boolean allowModification, boolean limitedModification, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, int itemSlot)
      Creates a slot view linked to a physical ItemStack in a player's inventory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlotViewGUI

        public SlotViewGUI​(CalibrePlugin plugin,
                   me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.gui.GUIManager guiManager,
                   CalibreComponent component,
                   boolean allowModification,
                   boolean limitedModification,
                   org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                   int itemSlot)
        Creates a slot view linked to a physical ItemStack in a player's inventory.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The CalibrePlugin.
        guiManager - The GUIManager.
        component - The component to create a view of.
        allowModification - If modifying any slots is allowed.
        limitedModification - If only slots which pass CalibreComponentSlot.canFieldModify() can be modified.
        player - The player whose inventory this is a component of.
        itemSlot - The slot which the specified component is in in the player's inventory.

      • SlotViewGUI

        public SlotViewGUI​(CalibrePlugin plugin,

        Creates a slot view of a virtual component (not linked to a real ItemStack).
        Parameters:
        plugin - The CalibrePlugin.
        guiManager - The GUIManager.
        component - The component to create a view of.
        allowModification - If modifying any slots is allowed.
